prompts: Create a cute slime-like Pokemon that can change colors and has a playful personality.
Imagine a whimsical Pokemon with soft, squishy features and oversized ears.
Show me a Pokemon that resembles a gooey creature with a gentle demeanor and vibrant colors.
Generate a tiny, purple Pokemon that thrives in wet environments and has a curious nature.
Design a Pokemon that looks like a friendly blob, with smooth textures and a shy personality.
Make a Pokemon with a unique body shape that fits well in both forests and caves.
Give me a Pokemon that showcases a blend of purple and green, perfect for a fantasy setting.
